code: import React from'react';import AnimatedValue from'./core/AnimatedValue';export default function useValue(initialValue){var ref=React.useRef(null);if(ref.current===null){ref.current=new AnimatedValue(initialValue);}return ref.current;}

sourcesContent: import React from'react';import AnimatedValue from'./core/AnimatedValue';export default function useValue(initialValue){var ref=React.useRef(null);if(ref.current===null){ref.current=new AnimatedValue(initialValue);}return ref.current;}
